main_definition: Thumbs refer to the gestures or expressions used by showing thumbs up (positive approval) or thumbs down (negative disapproval), as well as a slang term for giving high ratings in various contexts.

meanings_and_examples.example: The audience gave him a round of thumbs up after his performance.
After hearing the bad news, she crossed her arms and showed her displeasure with a thumbs down gesture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: High rating or approval in reviews
meanings_and_examples.example: The movie received overwhelmingly positive feedback from critics, earning it several thumbs up ratings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal way of expressing agreement or excitement
meanings_and_examples.example: When asked if she liked the new design, she replied with a thumbs gesture to show her approval.
